text: Ferdinand Hendrik Johannes "Ferd" Hugas (14 May 1937 â€“ 3 February 2025) was a Dutch actor and screenwriter. In the 1960 he founded together with among others Paul van Vliet the theatre . As a stage actor he played in among others in plays of Annie M.G Schmidt. As actor he played in dozens of television series, including De Zevensprong, Q & Q, Willem van Oranje and Medisch Centrum West. He was also a voice actor. Hugas died in The Hague on 3 February 2025, at the age of 87. ==References== Category:Dutch stage actors Category:Dutch television actors Category:Screenwriters Category:1937 births Category:2025 deaths Category:People from The Hague
title: Ferd Hugas
